01.name: ERR_LOAD_MODULES
01.explanation: Internal modules, which are absolutely necessary for CPU-Y to function, could not be loaded.

01.name: ERR_RENDER_UI
01.explanation: The user interface could not be rendered. This means that nothing can be displayed and therefore CPU-Y does not work.

02.name: ERR_RETR_SYSINF
02.explanation: Your system information could not be retrieved, so these commands will not work.

02.name: ERR_EVAL_SYSINF
02.explanation: Your system information could not be evaluated, so these commands will not work.
